entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
